mapper.select: select to_char(sysdate + (level-1), 'yyyy-mm-dd') as week from dual connect by level <= 7

select distinct s.schedule_time_start, s.schedule_time_end , m.movie_title, s.screen_no from schedule_tbl s join movie_tbl m using(movie_no)
where to_char(schedule_time_start, 'hh24:mi') >= to_char(sysdate, 'hh24:mi') order by 1
where to_char(schedule_time_start, 'hh24:mi') >= to_char(sysdate, 'hh24:mi') and movie_no = #{movieNo} order by 1
select distinct seat_row from seat_tbl where screen_no =#{screenNo} order by 1
select price, movie_type, price_per_age from price_tbl where movie_no = #{movieNo}
select * from seat_tbl where screen_no=#{screenNo} and seat_row = #{row} order by 2 asc
select movie_thumb, movie_title from movie_tbl where movie_no = #{movieNo}
select member_no from member_tbl where member_id = #{memberId}
select * from coupon_box_tbl join coupon_tbl using(coupon_no) where member_no=#{memberNo} and use_status = 'n'
